{"step_by_step_thinking": "Infant leukemia is not the most common inherited malignancy. Retinoblastoma is a rare type of eye cancer that usually develops in early childhood, typically before the age of 5. Wilm's tumour is a rare kidney cancer that primarily affects children. Neuroblastoma is a cancer that develops from immature nerve cells found in several areas of the body. Among these, Retinoblastoma is the most common inherited malignancy.", "answer_choice": "B. Retinoblastoma"}
